item.title: Rhythm mini-games collection Bits & Bops now available for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Console versions to follow at a later date.

Rhythm mini-games collection Bits & Bops is now available for PC via Steam for $15.99, developer Tempo Lab Games announced. PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and Switch versions will follow at a later date.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Bits & Bops is a collection of original rhythm mini-games!

Filled with catchy music, snappy gameplay and gorgeous, hand-drawn animation, Bits & Bops is sure to brighten your day.

Key Features

  • Over 20 rhythm mini-games to entertain and challenge you.
  • Super fun gameplay with simple controls that anyone can learn.
  • Catchy, upbeat original tunes sure to have you bopping along.
  • Gorgeous hand-drawn 2D animation that brings everything to life.
  • A custom game engine with lightning fast response times.
  • An adorable dog-bear named Bop to keep you company.

Watch the launch trailer below.

item.title: Board game-inspired puzzle narrative game Travel Pack! announced for console, PC
item.content:encoded:
Blackstaff Games has announced Travel Pack!, a light puzzle narrative game inspired by board games and travel. It will launch for unspecified console(s) and PC via Steam in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Pack yourself a set of dice and some comfy boots! It‚Äôs time to take a trip across this pocket-sized world of tiles, terrains and colorful characters.

Key Features

  • Board Game-Inspired Gameplay ‚Äì Hop through a world inspired by board games and travel. Roll dice, move across terrain tiles to collect them and score combos or open new paths. Collect fields to make it to the Quiet Village, or take the risky route and collect mountains to the Summit Pass. How far can you travel each day?
  • Make Friendships ‚Äì Meet fellow travelers on your adventure, as they share stories and introduce you to new gameplay. Hear the tall tales of the rugged fisherman as you cross the treacherous ocean, plan a getaway with the bubbly travel agent, or take a leisurely stroll with the wise sage. But be careful! who knows what‚Äôs lurking out there.
  • Charming and Calming World ‚Äì Take time to enjoy the miniature world between games to discover secrets, make new friends and explore the different ways to play in a low stakes, relaxing environment. Let the world guide you through each challenge. All accompanied by our cozy original soundtrack.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

item.title: Wylde Society ‚ÄòFirst Look‚Äô trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC

A first look at the period drama simulation game.

Studio Drydock has released a first look trailer for Wylde Society, the prequel to its previous game Wylde Flowers and a period drama simulation game about ‚Äúmagic, social events, and all things elegant.‚Äù

Here is an overview of the game, via Studio Drydock:

About

Step into the elegant heels of Vivian Wylde, witch, socialite and host, in period drama sim Wylde Society! Build, run and customize your magical boarding house in turn of the century Fairhaven. Host splendid events, expand your witchcraft, and influence the town. Who will you invite for tea?

Key Features

  • Step Back in Time ‚Äì Wylde Society takes place in the vibrant island of Fairhaven at the turn of the century. Enjoy and admire its Edwardian fashions, architecture, society rules and etiquette.
  • Run your Magical Boarding House ‚Äì Build, renovate and customize your magical boarding house! Invite, welcome and care for your tenants. Some may stay only a season, but with your help, others may find reasons to stay.
  • Host Splendid Parties ‚Äì As a local socialite, you will plan and host a range of fancy events including tea parties, dinners, and balls. Choose everything like the guest list, food, drink welcome toast, and seating plan. Will you keep the peace or instigate drama?
  • Explore the Beyond ‚Äì At the turn of the century, seances were very popular, but telling a true mystic from a charlatan was tricky! Vivian has a true knack for contacting spirits. Will you help Fairhaven‚Äôs departed with their unfinished business?
  • Befriend Magical Creatures ‚Äì Discover and collect familiars from cats to otters. These companions will not only help you with their witchy skills, but will also keep you company, even on your broom!

Wylde Society will be available for PC via Steam, with additional platform announcements to come as development progresses. A release date has yet to be announced.

item.title: Y2K-era Japan electronics repair shop simulator ReStory announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
Publisher tinyBuild and I Am Future developer Mandragora have announced ReStory, a simulation game that lets you run your own electronics repair shop in Y2K-era Japan. It will launch for PC via Steam in 2026.

‚ÄúReStory is my nostalgia for a time when we shared polyphonic ringtones via infrared ports and rewound cassette tapes with a pencil,‚Äù said Mandragora studio director Evgeny Kisterev in a press release. ‚ÄúWhen every device felt unique. Now we just hold these screens in our hands, and they all look the same. Japanese companies always amazed me with their influence on global technology, which made 2000s Tokyo the perfect setting. I can‚Äôt wait to share this nostalgic feeling with players and discover how many other grown-up kids remember that era fondly!‚Äù

  • ‚ùÆ
  • ‚ùØ

Here is an overview of the game, via tinyBuild:

About

ReStory lets you run your own electronics repair shop in Y2K-era Japan. Fix iconic pieces of 2000s tech, like cell phones, video game consoles (including officially licensed Atari systems), handhelds, digital pets, home appliances, music players, cameras, and more‚Äîall while hearing the unique stories of your customers and making meaningful decisions that influence a branching storyline.

ReStory combines tactile repair gameplay with the relaxing atmosphere, shop management mechanics, and a cast of memorable characters. Grow your business by carefully unscrewing, cleaning, soldering, repainting, and assembling devices to bring them back to life‚Äîand if you need spare parts, you can always buy them online via an old-school in-game web browser. Talk to customers, hear their stories, and see how your decisions impact both their lives and your shop through a non-linear narrative.

Key Features

  • Satisfying Gadget Repairs ‚Äì Chill out and vibe with engaging device restoration mechanics through every step of the tech-repair process.
  • Shop Management ‚Äì Take orders, manage your finances, browse the web and hunt for spare parts.
  • Impactful Narrative ‚Äì Meet a memorable cast of characters with unpredictable and intertwining stories. Your decisions will impact both their lives and your shop.
  • Y2K Nostalgia ‚Äì Fix devices inspired by iconic gaming consoles & handhelds, portable music players, cameras, home appliances and cell phones of the 2000s.
  • Wait, Is That an Atari?! ‚Äì Yes! Partnering with Atari, ReStory will feature licensed consoles to repair including the Atari 2600, Jaguar and more!
  • Chill Atmosphere ‚Äì ReStory creates a relaxing atmosphere that lets you unwind and tinker with gadgets against a beautiful backdrop of the Japanese urban setting.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Bug catching and matchmaking adventure game CatchMaker announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Catch bugs and match them for perfect romance.

Grand Duck Games has announced bug matchmaking adventure game CatchMaker for PC (Steam). A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

CatchMaker is a soothing bug-catching and matching adventure. Meet a quirky cast of friendly locals and explore a world buzzing with adorable little critters. Help the island‚Äôs residents restore balance to its unique ecosystem while uncovering the secrets of your own past and embracing your destiny.

Key Features

  • Catch Cute Bugs ‚Äì From Sillypedes to Rockroaches, the island is teeming with a colorful menagerie of critters. Observe them to learn their habits and catch them to complete your Field Guide. Approach them carefully, use clever lures, or try to chase them down with your net, you can catch the bugs in your own playstyle.
  • Match Cute Bugs ‚Äì The island is home to a diverse selection of randomly generated species and variants. Assume your role as the bugs‚Äô love doctor, find out what they are aching for, and set up the perfect romantic evening! Every date reveals more about a bug‚Äôs ideal partner helping you get closer to finding their soulmate.
  • Take Your Time ‚Äì Wander the sun‚Äëkissed beaches, trek the hilly meadows, stargaze from the cliffs, or simply hang out with the villagers. CatchMaker lets you pause the romance, soak in the scenery, and return to bug‚Äëwhispering whenever you‚Äôre ready.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

item.title: Fishbowl launches in April 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5

Narrative adventure game dated.

Narrative adventure game Fishbowl will launch for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam in April 2026, publisher Wholesome Games pResents and developer imissmyfriends.studio announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Wholesome Games Presents:

About

Fishbowl is a narrative game about dreams, grief, and hope. Rediscover your memories and find your way into the present in this intimate experience where slice-of-life meets surreal.

Drowning in feelings of grief, isolation, and the responsibilities of adulthood, Alo receives an unlikely lifeline in the form of a magical talking fish from her childhood. With Paplet as her companion, Alo unravels the threads of her past, giving way to a new future.

Key Features

  • Through daily tasks and activities, find ways to create a fulfilling life, even while in isolation.
  • With the help of an unlikely companion, re-examine events from your past and piece together the meaning of your dreams.
  • As a video editor, edit files with a dynamic matching game, meet your co-workers and support each other in doing the best that you can.
  • No bad endings, just different paths. The choices you make will shape the possibilities in Alo‚Äôs future.
  • Through the emotionally-rich narrative and thoughtful re-examination of your childhood, figure out who you want to be.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Cozy Caravan adds Apple Arcade version, launches January 8, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Smartphone
  • Switch

Single-player top-down adventure game dated.

Single-player top-down adventure game Cozy Caravan will leave Early Access and launch for Switch, PC via Steam, and Apple Arcade on January 8, 2026, developer 5 Lives Studios announced. The Apple Arcade version is newly announced.

Cozy Caravan in Early Access for PC via Steam on May 16, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via 5 Lives Studios:

Cozy Caravan courted quite the acclaim when it launched last year on Steam Early Access, where it‚Äôs accrued an average ‚ÄúVery Positive‚Äù user rating across over 400 players and won for Excellence in Sound Design at the 2024 Australian Game Developer Awards. In that time it‚Äôs received three major updates, adding massive new areas like Harvestvale, Cottonbluff Cove, and Bayside‚Äîeach bringing all new characters, quests, and cute, cozy vibes! The Switch version of Cozy Caravan will contain all the content from these and more, when it launches simultaneously with the full PC version emerging out of Steam Early Access.

Cozy Caravan lets you embark on an expedition where the arts of crafting, trading, and exploration come together in an enchanting, adorable world. Create your own cuddly alter-ego and explore open roads with your trusty caravan alongside your best buddy Bubba, setting up mobile markets as you sojourn from town to town. Craft a variety of items through delightful mini-games, then set up your market and trade with the locals.

Experience the warmth of small-town charm with every friendly gesture along the way. Encounter a rich tapestry of characters with their own stories and quests, deepening the sense of connection and community on your travels. Stop and say hello to the local townsfolk and join in on fun activities. And keep an eye out, you never know where you might find someone who could use a lift!

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Lush post-apocalyptic adventure game Verdant announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Survive a beautiful yet harsh world.

Publisher Megabit and developer Tiny Roar have announced Verdant, an adventure game set in a lush post-apocalyptic world. It will be available for PC via Steam. A release date was not announced.

‚ÄúVerdant is a hopeful coming-of-age story,‚Äù said Tiny Roar co-founder and Verdant director Maurice Hagelstein in a press release. ‚ÄúThroughout Sprout‚Äôs journey players will encounter difficult moral choices and moments of poignant nostalgia as they balance their own survival against the needs of the natural world. We‚Äôre excited to show players more of Verdant in the future.‚Äù

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Accompany Sprout on his journey through the green post-apocalyptic world of Verdant. Survive the beautiful yet harsh environment by building camps and upgrading your gear. Balance life and death literally in your hand with your powers and uncover their connection to the downfall of humanity.

Key Features

  • Explore a Changed World ‚Äì After a devastating war, the world has fundamentally changed. Flora and fauna have mutated and reclaimed cities while human technology and culture have not moved on from the 1980s. Piece together the story of how the world changed and determine your role in building its future.
  • Be the Catalyst ‚Äì Use Sprout‚Äôs unique powers to take and bestow life essence from nature to shape the world around you. Will you decide to absorb an innocent deer to heal yourself, or use its essence to cleanse the small stream ahead? The choice may be difficult, but it is yours to make.
  • Prepare for Every Possibility ‚Äì The world of Verdant may look beautiful, but many dangers lurk within its lush greenery. As you journey through the lands, you‚Äôll need to gather resources, craft and upgrade your gear and think fast if you want to survive.
  • Ensure your Survival ‚Äì As an inexperienced fighter with limited firepower, you‚Äôll need to rely on your wits to avoid and outsmart enemies. Staying hydrated, well-fed and rested is just as important to your survival; the rumbling of a hungry stomach can alert nearby animals and lack of sleep can lead your mind to play tricks on you.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

item.title: Spirit Crossing adds PC version
item.content:encoded:
• PC

PC version published independently by Spry Fox.

Following news that Spry Fox will be spinning out of Netflix and become an independent studio again, the developer has announced a PC version of cozy massively multiplayer online game Spirit Crossing will launch via Steam in early 2026.

Spirit Crossing is currently in open alpha testing for iOS via App Store (TestFlight) and Android via Google Play. The mobile versions will remain published by Netflix, but the PC version will be published by Spry Fox.

Here is an overview of the game, via Spry Fox:

Spirit Crossing is a cozy massively multiplayer online game focused on the joy of shared experiences, creative expression, and connection with friends within a vast, beautiful world with ever-changing environments. The game invites players to relax and explore a fantastical landscape as they harvest, participate in fishing tournaments or simply enjoy a quiet sunrise with friends or by themselves.

As players join the game, they will be assigned to a Waystation‚Äîa unique, thriving community that players collectively build, decorate, and fortify through offerings and acts of kindness. Players can travel to other Waystations, and participate in co-op activities such as harvesting, dancing and mural painting, or simply enjoy the world at their own pace.

Spirit Crossing emphasizes social interaction through a unique friendship progression system which unlocks features over time, such as proximity chat, two-player emotes, instant teleportation, and gift-giving. Beyond construction and socializing, self-expression is encouraged and facilitated with a housing system letting players decorate their own spaces with their own creative vision, and extensive avatar customization options.

During exploration, they will encounter delightfully small square bears, mysterious and charming villagers and wandering spirits in need of help and safety. With patience and kindness they will start to slowly open up to the player, revealing their stories and even gifting items back.

Watch a new trailer below.
